name: Clay Boy
description:
Clay boy is tall
Clay boy is wide
Clay boy is it all

Come and enter clay boy's world and embark on a little adventure where you have to use his three dimensional stretch skills in a little different platforming physics challenges.

You find a tutorial at the start

Move: W and Mouse
Stretch: Left Mouse, Right Mouse, A, D
Jump: Spacebar
Reset to Checkpoint: R

Mute Music: M
Fullscreen: Alt + Enter
Exit: Alt + F4
